褞褞褞

褞字的基本解释

褞
yùn
古同“緼”，乱麻，旧絮：“二三子布弊褞袍，不足以避寒。”

褞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yùn］
［《廣韻》於粉切，上吻，影。］
通“緼1”。
乱麻，旧絮。参见“褞袍”。

褞字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　褞； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1121第35
【唐韻】於粉切【集韻】委粉切，?音韞。衣也。【廣韻】褞袿也。　又【韻會】烏昆切，音溫。【類篇】褞，褐衣也。【晉·王沈·釋時論】袞龍出於褞褐，卿相出於匹夫。

褞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
褞字的起名意思

暂无。

Cuddly
Basic explanation of words
Cuddly
yùn
Gu Tong's "緼", messy hemp, and old Xu: "Two or three people clothed badly in robes, not enough to keep out the cold."
Cuddly
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yùn］
["Guangyun" cuts in powder, kisses on, and shadows. ]
Same as "緼1".
Mess, old flocculation. See "fur robes."
Cuddly
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [The Department of Clothing Characters] 　褞; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1121 Page 35
[Tang Yun] Yufenqie 【Jiyun】Weifenqie,? Yin Yun. Clothes also. 【Guangyun】Furthermore.　[Yunhui] Ukunchi, sound temperature. 【Classes】Hard and brown clothes. 【Jin·Wang Shen·Shi Shi Lun】Gunlong came from the brown, and Qingxiang came from the husband.

Old glyph
Cuddly
Name meaning
Nothing.
yùn
通"缊"。 乱麻, 旧絮 coarse hemp。 如: 褞袍(以乱麻衬于其中的袍子。 古贫者无力具丝絮, 仅能以麻着于衣内, 故称); 褞褐(破旧的以乱麻旧絮充内的袍子)
